zh: 市場交易時間中所傳送之交易資訊為即時資訊。
市場交易時間中所傳送之股價指數資訊。包括「指數時間」、「成交總指數」、「不含金融指數」、「分類指數」、「成交總金額」與「昨日總加權指數等項。
經由其他已與本中心簽約之申請使用者（即時交易資訊廠商）（不含證券商、期貨商）間接連線取得資訊。
較即時交易資訊延遲二十分鐘以上之股價指數及個股交易資訊。
經由其他已與本中心簽約之申請使用者（即時交易資訊廠商）（不含證券商、期貨商）間接連線取得資訊
盤後資訊(收市後交易資訊)
市場交易時間以後所傳播之當日證券行情資訊為盤後資訊
本中心交易資訊使用管理辦法、法規、計費標準(含契約)
創櫃/創意集資公司專區
證券櫃檯買賣中心 版權所有©1994-2023  10084台北市中正區羅斯福路二段100號15樓
本站建議最佳瀏覽條件：螢幕解析度 1024x768 以上，瀏覽器為 Chrome、Safari、Edge、FireFox。
en: Trading information transmitted during market hours is real time information. (TWD75,000/month)
Real time stock price index information

Stock price index information transmitted during market hours. Including "index time", "total weighted stock index", "non financials index", "class index", "total value traded", and "yesterday's weighted index". (TWD4,000/month)

Users (real time information vendors) who apply through a third party (excluding securities dealers and futures dealers) who have already signed contracts with the TPEx will obtain information through indirect connection.
Stock index and stock trading information that are delayed for 20 minutes or more behind real time trading information. (TWD12,000/month)

Users (real time information vendors) who apply through a third party (excluding securities dealers and futures dealers) who have already signed contracts with the TPEx will obtain information through indirect connection.
After hours information (trading information after the market closes)
Agreement on the Term and Conditions of Subscription to End-of-Day Trading Data
Administrative guidelines, regulations, and fee schedules (including contracts) that apply to TPEx trading information.
Tel: +886-2-23699555, Emerging Stock Trading Hotline: +886-2-2366-6102, Investor Hotline: +886-2-23666100
Recommended using Chrome,Safari or FireFox with 1024x768 screen resolution to browse the website.
